content: Investments Asked by AnonymousAsked on 05 Mar 2019Are there any investments that i should stay away from?2 answersAnswerBump0

Jonathan Chia Guangrong, Fund Manager at JCG FundLevel 6. MasterAnswered on 05 Mar 2019Those schemes asking you to invest into plantations, or anything on the MAS investor alert list. Bitcoin and ico as well, unless you are trading bitcoin actively and its not held by any platform0 comments0
Gabriel Tham, Kenichi Tag Team Member at Tag TeamLevel 8. WizardAnswered on 05 Mar 2019Anything that you don't understand or if you are looking for a quick buck, get rich quick schemes.0 comments0
